Text: Our daughter LOVES this series and thanks to you we are able to view all episodes in the series. We can catch up before we begin watching Season 4 which has just started airting on Canadian TV. You have given much of yourself and your time in uploading movies for others to enjoy. Thank you, SOFTLINE,  from Karen in Canada.
Could you put up season 3 episodes 6 and 7 please?

I'll second the motion for episodes 6 and 7. What I've found (in that season 1, 2, 3 and part of 4 torrent) are 480x352 with letterbox bars.

Thanks much in advance.
